author: Patrick Buchanan
title: How Will Trump Use COVID-19 for War Isolation?
description: In engaging with the world, we should put our own interests first, as every nation in the world is doing now. The post How Will Trump Use COVID-19 for War Isolation? appeared first on The American Conservative.
content:
In engaging with the world, we should put our own interests first, as every nation in the world is doing now.To fight the coronavirus at home, France is removing all military forces from Iraq.
